summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by reducing the default marquee speed from 200 to 140 in TrackTitleMarquee, with corresponding speed default reflected in useMarqueeMeasurements. No evidence in the diff indicates any required MiniPlayer/NowPlaying prop changes were made (which aligns with the requirement). There are additional unrelated file modifications not requested in the BuildRequest.
